metadata.title: Infoblox SOC Get Insight Details
metadata.description: Leverages the Infoblox SOC Insights API to enrich a Microsoft Sentinel Incident triggered by an Infoblox SOC Insight & ingest Insight details into custom InfobloxInsight tables. The tables are used to build the Infoblox SOC Insights Workbook. This playbook can be configured to run automatically when an incident occurs (recommended) or run on demand.
postDeployment: 1. Grant playbook's Managed Identity **Microsoft Sentinel Responder** or greater to Resource Group.

metadata.description: Enter value for Infoblox API Key
